column4: i have a ~/bin directory in it is a copy of Eclipse, ~/bin is in my path but when i run eclipse i get ~/bin/eclipse: Permission Denied
anyone point me how to fix this?
If you want to install eclipse the easy way
Why do you need the newest of the new
ah they are actually finally up to 3.5
Bash does not look in that folder normally
yes i know i added it to my $PATH variable
why do you want it to be there? instead of in /usr/sbin
this seems like alot of effort over nothing
